Class Main

  • plham.Env
    • plham.main.Simulator
      • plham.Main

  • public class Main
extends Simulator

      • getItemsByName

        public <T> List<T> getItemsByName(String name)
        Get a list of items (instances) stored in GLOBAL by the name.
        Parameters:
        name - a section name defined in the JSON config file.
        Returns:
        a list of instances having the name.

      • getItemByName

        public <T> T getItemByName(String name)
        Get an item (instance) stored in GLOBAL by the name. Since in GLOBAL even a single item is stored as List, the size must be 1. This throws an exception if the size is > 1.
        Parameters:
        name - a section name defined in the JSON config file.
        Returns:
        an instance having the name.

      • getItemsByName

        public <T> List<T> getItemsByName(Fun_0_1 <Long,String> names,
                                           Long n)
        Declaration: getItemsByName[T](names:(Long)=>String, n:Long):List[T].
        Get a list of items (instances) stored in GLOBAL specified by the list of names.
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        names - section names defined in the JSON config file.
        

        n - the length of names.
        

        Returns:
        

        a list of instances having the names.

        getItemsByName
        

        public <T> List<T> getItemsByName(JSON.Value json)
        

        Get a list of items (instances) stored in GLOBAL specified by the list of names.
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        json - section name(s) (String or List) defined in the JSON config file.
        

        Returns:
        

        a list of instances having the name(s).
        

        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        getItemByName
        

        public <T> T getItemByName(JSON.Value json)
        

        Get an item (instance) stored in GLOBAL by the name.
Since in GLOBAL even a single item is stored as List, the size must be 1.
This throws an exception if the size is > 1.
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        json - a section name (String or List) defined in the JSON config file.
        

        Returns:
        

        an instance having the name.
